rules.name: None
rules.description: Good old normal chess.

rules.name: The people's monarch
rules.description: You can only capture your opponent's pawns with a pawn or king.

rules.name: Hungry hungry monarch
rules.description: You can only capture your opponent's pawns with your king.

rules.name: No jail can hold me
rules.description: Your opponents pawns can not be captured.

rules.name: Figurehead
rules.description: Your king can't actually capture anything.

rules.name: Can't Convert Her
rules.description: Your bishops can't capture the opponent's queen.

rules.name: Animosity
rules.description: Your pawns can only capture other pawns.

rules.name: Punching Down
rules.description: Your queen can only capture pawns.

rules.name: Can't Stomp Her
rules.description: Your knights can't capture the opponent's queen.

rules.name: Two Guys In A Cheap Costume
rules.description: Your knights can't actually capture anything.

rules.name: False Prophets
rules.description: Your bishops can't actually capture anything.

rules.name: Trophy Wife
rules.description: Your queen can't actually capture anything.

rules.name: Anti-Theist
rules.description: Your queen can only capture bishops.

rules.name: Fool Of A Rook
rules.description: Your rooks can't actually capture anything.

rules.name: Pawn v. Pawn
rules.description: You can only capture your opponent's pawns with your pawns.

rules.name: Demolition Woman
rules.description: Your queen can only capture rooks.

rules.name: Lepers
rules.description: Your pawns cannot capture other pawns.

rules.name: Sacred
rules.description: You can't capture bishops.

rules.name: No Animals Were Harmed In The Playing Of This Chess Game
rules.description: You can't capture knights.

rules.name: Heiress To The Elmer's Fortune
rules.description: Your queen can only capture knights.

rules.name: Can't Imprison Her
rules.description: Your rooks can't capture the opponent's queen.

rules.name: Stonework Enjoyer
rules.description: You can't capture rooks.

rules.name: Long Service
rules.description: Your bishops can't move after turn 20.

rules.name: Poisoned Apple
rules.description: Your queen can't move after turn 6.

rules.name: Before The Clock Strikes 12
rules.description: Your queen can't move after turn 12.

rules.name: Quick Prayer
rules.description: Your bishops can't move after turn 10.

rules.name: Sleep Tight
rules.description: Your knights can't move after turn 15.

rules.name: Not To Code
rules.description: Your rooks can't move after turn 20.

rules.name: Wrong Permits
rules.description: Your rooks can't move after turn 25.

rules.name: Sleeping Beauty
rules.description: Your queen can't move after turn 9.

rules.name: Don't Let The Bedbugs Bite
rules.description: Your knights can't move after turn 10.

rules.name: Condemnable
rules.description: Your rooks can't move after turn 15.

rules.name: A Sermon Or Two
rules.description: Your bishops can't move after turn 15.

rules.name: Good Night
rules.description: Your knights can't move after turn 20.

rules.name: Border Guards
rules.description: Your rooks can only move along the a and h files and the 1st and 8th rank.

rules.name: The Queen of Darkness
rules.description: Your queen can only move to dark squares.

rules.name: The King of Darkness
rules.description: Your king can only move to dark squares.

rules.name: The King of Light
rules.description: Your king can only move to light squares.

rules.name: The Queen of Light
rules.description: Your queen can only move to light squares.

rules.name: E-zy
rules.description: You can't land any chess piece on the e file.

rules.name: No ec-cess
rules.description: You can't land any chess piece on the c or e files.

rules.name: What the hec
rules.description: You can't land any chess piece on the h, e, or c files.

rules.name: Age restriction
rules.description: You can't land any chess piece on the h file.

rules.name: I can't C
rules.description: You can't land any chess piece on the c file.

rules.name: Ch. 0
rules.description: You can't land any chess piece on the c or h files.

rules.name: eh...
rules.description: You can't land any chess piece on the e or h files.

rules.name: Rush A
rules.description: Open with a4, a5 or a5, a4.

rules.name: You're Going To University And That's Final!
rules.description: You are forced to play the Scholar's Mate: e4, Bc4, Qh5 or e5, Bc5, Qh4.

rules.name: Tempt Fate
rules.description: Open with f3, g4 or f6, g5 and hope for the best.

rules.name: Anti-Feingold
rules.description: Open with f3, f4 or f6, f5.

rules.name: Outsiders
rules.description: Open with a4, h4 or  a5, h5.

rules.name: Good Game
rules.description: Start with g3, g4 or g6, g5.

rules.name: Bongcloud And Back
rules.description: Open with e4, Ke2, Ke1 / e5, Ke7, Ke8.

rules.name: Say Cheese!
rules.description: Open with c4, d3, e4 or c5, d6, e5

rules.name: The Knights Grimm
rules.description: Open with Na3, Nh3 or Na6, Nh6

rules.name: Ctrl-Z
rules.description: Open with Nc3, Nb1 or Nc6, Nb8.

rules.name: Guns Out
rules.description: Open with a4, Ra3, h4, Rh3 or a5, Ra6, h5, Rh6.

rules.name: Bongcloud
rules.description: Open with e4, Ke2 or e5, Ke7.

rules.name: Rush B
rules.description: Open with b4, b5 or b5, b4.

rules.name: Gates Are Open, Come On In
rules.description: Open with d3, f3 or d6, f6.
